question:
A company has customers located across the world. The company wants to use automation to secure its systems and network infrastructure. The company's security team must be able to track and audit all incremental changes to the infrastructure.

Which solution will meet these requirements?

options.A: Use AWS Organizations to set up the infrastructure. Use AWS Config to track changes.
options.B: Use AWS CloudFormation to set up the infrastructure. Use AWS Config to track changes.
options.C: Use AWS Organizations to set up the infrastructure. Use AWS Service Catalog to track changes.
options.D: Use AWS CloudFormation to set up the infrastructure. Use AWS Service Catalog to track changes.

explanation: AWS CloudFormation provides infrastructure as code for automated, consistent infrastructure setup. AWS Config tracks and records configuration changes over time, enabling auditing of incremental changes to resources. Organizations manages accounts, not infrastructure setup.
